definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: That is absolutely unprecedented in American science.
sentences.chinese: 這在美國科學史上絕對是前所未聞的。

sentences.english: That is part of the wonder of evolutionary science.
sentences.chinese: 這是進化科學史的一個研究主題。

sentences.english: "Internal History" is still the mainstream, "External History" is increasing.
sentences.chinese: 內史仍是科學史的主流，外史在不斷增加。

sentences.english: Some books on science and the history of science are poorly written.
sentences.chinese: 有些科學或科學史圖書寫得非常糟糕。

sentences.english: Science history can also help students understand why scientific knowledge grows ever more accurate.
sentences.chinese: 科學史可以幫助學生理解科學知識正變得更加準確。

sentences.english: This has established the book of Erya as an important works in the world history of science.
sentences.chinese: 這奠定了《爾雅》一書是世界科學史上的重要著作。

sentences.english: He is the unsung hero of British science.
sentences.chinese: 他是英國科學史上未經讚美的英雄。

sentences.english: In the book, there are lot of penetrating analysis in many subjects especialy in the history of Chinese scientific thought.
sentences.chinese: 在具體科學史問題的研究上，該書也有許多重要突破。

sentences.english: We are also discussing possibilities for extending our programmes on the history of science.
sentences.chinese: 我們還在討論把我們的科學史項目加以擴展的可能性。
